recommended_degree: Manajemen Bisnis, Bisnis, Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Sistem Informasi Bisnis, Manajemen Keuangan (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Manage end-to-end business growth related projects from approach alignment, analysis, proposed solutions, implementation, and reporting to top management.
2. Conduct and consolidate overall budget/ target projection, including short-term and long-term, according to management direction.
3. Generate market trends (competitive intelligence, benchmarking), by summarizing key findings, insights, and tailored it to relevant stakeholders.
